channel.title: Client that displayes IDs [317]?
channel.description:
I have a client that used to show the IDs of everything you right-clicked (so if you right clicked money it would should ID 995 along with the other options). Also when I right-clicked an object it showed the ID (bank booth would show 2213). It makes it so much easier when I can see the ID's of everything (instead of having to go through lots of ID lists). So I was wondering if any of you knew how to add this to this other client I'm using? I would REALLY appreciate if you helped me! Thanks.
Btw I searched for a tut to do this but I couldn't find any.
PLEASE HELP!

item.title: Client that displayes IDs [317]?
item.dc:creator: @VillainScape VillainScape
item.description:
@VillainScape wrote:

BandosScape v2 and v3

Search it with the search function.

Read full topic

item.title: Client that displayes IDs [317]?
item.dc:creator: @SecondHeat SecondHeat
item.description:
@SecondHeat wrote:

I have a client that used to show the IDs of everything you right-clicked (so if you right clicked money it would should ID 995 along with the other options). Also when I right-clicked an object it showed the ID (bank booth would show 2213).
It makes it so much easier when I can see the ID’s of everything (instead of having to go through lots of ID lists). So I was wondering if any of you knew how to add this to this other client I’m using? I would REALLY appreciate if you helped me! Thanks.
